column4: Is there a simple command-line tool to take PNG screenshots of a desktop?
sure - install imagemagick and do  ' import -window root foo.png "

amd 64 ?
I never tried installing java on the live CD - s it even possible?
Well, my USB pen drive is the storage device used by the LiveCD, so it's entirely possible to install whatever as long as there's enough space.
you can only use a CD to upgrade if you have the "alternate" Cd. and the command is  sudo apt-cdrom add
I don't have a burner available, I'm just grabbing the ISO.
I've never tried it, but you might be able to loop mount your iso and add it as a source that way
but note that only the alternate iso has packages on it
alternate?
there are two iso choices - desktop and alternate
desktop = live CD with installer , alternate = text installer CD with full packages
